headline: Kratos Defense Continues to Sharpen Its Edge in Hypersonic Tech
summary: KTOS expands its hypersonic footprint with new systems, a joint venture and a $50M payload facility in Indiana.

headline: Valence Surface Technologies Acquires C.I.L. Metal Finishing and C.I.L. Electroplating
summary: EL SEGUNDO, Calif., August 04, 2025--Valence Surface Technologies LLC ("Valence"), the largest independent aerospace surface finishing platform in North America, today announced the acquisition of C.I.L. Metal Finishing and C.I.L. Electroplating ("CIL" or the "Company"), a leading provider of surface treatment for highly engineered products in the North American aerospace and defense market. CIL provides surface treatment to leading U.S. customers and platforms under key approvals, including Ray

headline: Palantir Rides Epic Hot Streak Into Earnings Report
summary: The AI-powered, data-crunching defense tech company enters its earnings call Monday as the year’s hottest stocks on the S&P 500.

raw.headline: Palantir Rides Epic Hot Streak Into Earnings Report

headline: Boeing Defense Union Strikes For First Time Since 1996
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Workers at Boeing Co.’s St. Louis-area defense factories are striking for the first time in nearly three decades after union members rejected the company’s modified contract offer. headline: Latecoere completes the sale of MADES to the Cicor Group
summary: TOULOUSE, France, August 04, 2025--Regulatory News: Following on from its press release dated 4 April 2025, and the fulfilment of all conditions precedent to closing the sale and purchase agreement, Latecoere (PARIS:LAT) confirms the completion of the sale to the Cicor Group.
